name: The Whispering Woods
storyline:
Detective Lukas Berger is investigating the sudden disappearance of several residents from a remote village. Clues are scarce until he receives a call from his colleague John: an abandoned house deep in the forest might hold the key. But as Lukas arrives, he quickly realizes that something is not right. Dark shadows, unexplainable noises, and an eerie presence await him.

Explore the mysterious house in this first-person horror game and face the unknown. Solve challenging puzzles and uncover the truth behind the disappearances – but beware: some secrets are better left undiscovered...
